keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MERNA THOMAS

lead_paragraph: Egyptian militants with ties to the Islamic State group killed at least 12 people in the northern Sinai Peninsula on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Sinai Group Kills Officers in Bombings
headline.main: Sinai Group Kills Officers in Bombings

snippet: Egyptian militants with ties to the Islamic State group killed at least 12 people in the northern Sinai Peninsula on Sunday.
abstract: Militants linked to the Islamic State carryout three separate attacks on security forces in Egypt's Sinai Peninsula, killing at least 12 people.
